tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE population_health_data ( 
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    age INT, 
    gender VARCHAR, 
    city VARCHAR, 
    chronic_disease VARCHAR 
);

CREATE TABLE population_health_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING,
    chronic_disease BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ChronicDiseaseData (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    diagnosis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE RiskFactors (
    risk_factor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_factor_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE HealthIndicators (
    indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_name VARCHAR(255),
    value NUMERIC,
    category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE diseases (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    prevalence_rate DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    affected_population INT NOT NULL,
    country_id INT REFERENCES populations(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
CREATE TABLE demographics (id INT PRIMARY KEY, age INT, gender VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), income INT)
CREATE TABLE medical_history (id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, disease_name VARCHAR(255), diagnosis_date DATE, treatment VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE risk_factors (id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, risk_factor VARCHAR(255), risk_level VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE medications (id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, medication_name VARCHAR(255), dosage VARCHAR(255), frequency VARCHAR(255)
CREATE TABLE appointments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, appointment_date DATE, doctor_id INT, notes TEXT)
